name: Disaster Planet
description:
Made by Team Solo Queue (whose only member is Solanima) for the WWU 2016 Fall Game Jam!

In Disaster Planet, a crew of four space travelers have crash landed on a hostile alien world! Two of them manage to find their way to an old abandoned fort, where they can keep safe from the vicious beasts that roam the local land. They will have to work together to gather food and water, man the auto-defense systems, maintain the wall integrity of the fort, and search the crash site for the other two crew members. Can they survive long enough for help to arrive? Or will the daily "Deck of Disaster" spell their doom? Find out in... Disaster Planet!
